snippet: The Master Lock 1500eDBX DialSpeed has a light-up electronic touch pad face instead of a spinning dial, unlocking with a combination of up, down, left and right clicks.
abstract: The Master Lock 1500eDBX DialSpeed has a light-up electronic touch pad face instead of a spinning dial, unlocking with a combination of up, down, left and right clicks.

headline.main: A Padlock People Might Want to Steal
headline.print_headline: A Combination Lock That a Thief Might Want to Steal
